anchorPoint.description:
Determine anchor point of the layer and how it should behave
in terms of scale, size or rotation transformations.

autoRename.description: Whether updating the characters in the text node should update the name of the node. If this is set to true, name will be auto-derived from characters.

characters.description: The characters in the range of text with the same styles.

endIndex.description: End index (exclusive) of the range of characters.

entityType.description: [DEPRECATED] Was used in model v0. Check if we can remove it.

entry.description: Determine if frame is an entry point of a render tree

fontSize.description: The size of the font. Has minimum value of 1.

fontWeight.description: The weight of the font (e.g. 400 for "Regular", 700 for "Bold").

hangingList.description: Whether numbered list counters or unordered list bullets hang outside the text box.

hangingPunctuation.description: Whether punctuation, like quotation marks, hangs outside the text box.

initialNodeId.description: Holds initial node id so data can be copied on project creation

letterSpacingValue.description: The spacing between the individual characters.

lineHeightUnit.description: When line height unit is not applied to entity then line height treat as `AUTO` which similar to how CSS works

lineHeightValue.description: The spacing between the lines in a paragraph of text.

listSpacing.description: The vertical distance between lines of a list.

mainNodeComponentId.description: ID of the main node, stores the Aninix ID. Works similar to `mainComponent` property in Figma.

mask.description: Determine if current entity is mask or not

maxLines.description: The maximum number of lines a text node can reach before it truncates. Only applicable when `textTruncation` is set to "ENDING".

metadata.description: Stores as stringified json. Used to set additional data to entities.

paragraphIndent.description: The indentation of paragraphs (offset of the first line from the left).

presetId.description: Holds ID of the animation preset to further work. Probably in future would be changed to reference instead of plain string.

renderScale.description: Used to determine exporting file scaling factor

renderScaleType.description:
[DEPRECATED] Use RenderScaleComponent instead. In the next version we are supporting any render scales (eg using numbers).
Used to determine exporting file scaling factor

renderSuffix.description: Define custom suffix for rendered file

renderType.description: Used to determine exporting file format

startIndex.description: Start index (inclusive) of the range of characters.

textAlignHorizontal.description: The horizontal alignment of the text with respect to the textbox.

textAlignVertical.description: The vertical alignment of the text with respect to the textbox.

textAutoResize.description: The behavior of how the size of the text box adjusts to fit the characters.

textCase.description: Overrides the case of the raw characters in the text node.

textDecoration.description: Whether the text is underlined or has a strikethrough.

textTruncation.description: Whether this text node will truncate with an ellipsis when the text node size is smaller than the text inside.

schemaVersion.description: Current schema version of the entity
